T02D2078:158b-1: aa lum bi ni pi sh'a tsi s'a dha nam /
T02D2078:158b-3: sha za aa lumbi ni'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2078:158b-4: aom lumbi ni bi lumbi ni sham sha pi sh'a tsa ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2078:158b-6: khyim stong bar nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas mgal ba'i me byas te /
T02D2078:158b-7: las thams cad pa'i thab khung du rang gi khrag dang /
T02D2078:158b-12: thod pa dum bu lnga pa dang /
T02D2078:158b-13: ba glang gi khrag gis byugs pa'i seng ldeng gi
T02D2078:158b-14: so shing stong phrag gcig la bka' bsgo zhing gcer
T02D2078:158b-15: bur byas pas spyin sreg byas te mthong nas ma'am
T02D2078:158b-17: nis ka bcu drug slong na brgyad ster ro //
T02D2078:158b-18: rang gi khrag dang chang bsres pas mo byung ba'i dus su mchod yon phul lo //
